comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: Trying to read what he is playing - looks like a waltz.   Fascinating to see all the clutter around the room. In old photos interiors seem not to look like an art director's imagination in 'period' films.

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] Sometimes it makes you think they got every vase in the house and placed it in the room to pose for the photo :P
